name: Fabric Calculator
description: Calculate fabric yardage needed for your sewing projects. Account for pattern matching, seam allowances, and fabric width.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-scissors size-5"><circle cx="6" cy="6" r="3"></circle><path d="M8.12 8.12 12 12"></path><path d="M20 4 8.12 15.88"></path><circle cx="6" cy="18" r="3"></circle><path d="M14.8 14.8 20 20"></path></svg>

name: Yarn Calculator
description: Estimate yarn requirements for knitting and crochet projects. Convert between different yarn weights and calculate yardage needed.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-ruler size-5"><path d="M21.3 15.3a2.4 2.4 0 0 1 0 3.4l-2.6 2.6a2.4 2.4 0 0 1-3.4 0L2.7 8.7a2.41 2.41 0 0 1 0-3.4l2.6-2.6a2.41 2.41 0 0 1 3.4 0Z"></path><path d="m14.5 12.5 2-2"></path><path d="m11.5 9.5 2-2"></path><path d="m8.5 6.5 2-2"></path><path d="m17.5 15.5 2-2"></path></svg>

name: Bead Weight Calculator
description: Calculate the weight and quantity of beads needed for jewelry making. Convert between different bead sizes and shapes.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-scale size-5"><path d="m16 16 3-8 3 8c-.87.65-1.92 1-3 1s-2.13-.35-3-1Z"></path><path d="m2 16 3-8 3 8c-.87.65-1.92 1-3 1s-2.13-.35-3-1Z"></path><path d="M7 21h10"></path><path d="M12 3v18"></path><path d="M3 7h2c2 0 5-1 7-2 2 1 5 2 7 2h2"></path></svg>

name: Box Dimensions Calculator
description: Calculate dimensions for custom gift boxes and packaging. Include allowances for folding and assembly.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-box size-5"><path d="M21 8a2 2 0 0 0-1-1.73l-7-4a2 2 0 0 0-2 0l-7 4A2 2 0 0 0 3 8v8a2 2 0 0 0 1 1.73l7 4a2 2 0 0 0 2 0l7-4A2 2 0 0 0 21 16Z"></path><path d="m3.3 7 8.7 5 8.7-5"></path><path d="M12 22V12"></path></svg>

name: Pattern Layout Calculator
description: Optimize pattern placement on fabric to minimize waste. Calculate the most efficient layout for multiple pattern pieces.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-grid3x3 size-5"><rect width="18" height="18" x="3" y="3" rx="2"></rect><path d="M3 9h18"></path><path d="M3 15h18"></path><path d="M9 3v18"></path><path d="M15 3v18"></path></svg>

name: Paint Coverage Calculator
description: Calculate paint needed for your craft projects. Estimate coverage for different surfaces and paint types.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-palette size-5"><circle cx="13.5" cy="6.5" r=".5" fill="currentColor"></circle><circle cx="17.5" cy="10.5" r=".5" fill="currentColor"></circle><circle cx="8.5" cy="7.5" r=".5" fill="currentColor"></circle><circle cx="6.5" cy="12.5" r=".5" fill="currentColor"></circle><path d="M12 2C6.5 2 2 6.5 2 12s4.5 10 10 10c.926 0 1.648-.746 1.648-1.688 0-.437-.18-.835-.437-1.125-.29-.289-.438-.652-.438-1.125a1.64 1.64 0 0 1 1.668-1.668h1.996c3.051 0 5.555-2.503 5.555-5.554C21.965 6.012 17.461 2 12 2z"></path></svg>
